title: 3-D print of John Snow cholera map
description: You know the John Snow map that highlights a cholera outbreak in London,…Tags: 3-D printing, ‪Alex Selby-Boothroyd, John Snow, physical
author: Nathan Yau
excerpt: You know the John Snow map that highlights a cholera outbreak in London, from 1854. Alex Selby-Boothroyd made a 3-D-printed version that brings the stacked counts out of the map.
text: You know the John Snow map that highlights a cholera outbreak in London, from 1854. Alex Selby-Boothroyd made a 3-D-printed version that brings the stacked counts out of the map.
